summary: Iteration 9 - Frontend testing of quick access buttons (Casco, Máscara, Bastones) in Nuevo Alquiler page. All 5 requested features verified successfully.
passed_tests: 1. Quick add button 'Casco' (data-testid='quick-add-helmet') is visible - PASSED
2. Quick add button 'Máscara' (data-testid='quick-add-goggles') is visible - PASSED
3. Quick add button 'Bastones' (data-testid='quick-add-poles') is visible - PASSED
4. Buttons are positioned below items list and above totals section - PASSED (helmet y=616, total y=685)
5. Clicking Casco button adds first available helmet item instantly - PASSED (Smith Vantage added)
6. Total updates immediately after adding item (€0.00 → €5.00) - PASSED
7. Error message shown when no goggles available ('No hay máscaras disponibles') - PASSED
8. Error message shown when no poles available ('No hay bastones disponibles') - PASSED
context_for_next_testing_agent: Quick access buttons feature is fully functional. The 3 buttons (Casco, Máscara, Bastones) are compact (h-7), use Plus icon with text, and are located in a toolbar below the items list. The quickAddItem function correctly fetches the first available item of the specified type and adds it to the rental. Error handling works correctly when no items are available. Note: Currently only helmet items are available in the system; goggles and poles show 'not available' error messages.
